name: Draconic Elemental Affinity (Dragonborn)
entries: You gain Damage reduction equal to your Proficiency Bonus for your Dragon breath weapon element.
Your breath weapon is now a recharge of 6 (not affected by the dragon's breath dragon jelly transformation).

You additionally have advantage on saving throws against terrain effects created by a mature dragon of your elemental type's territory/lair, such as extreme heat from a red dragon's volcano or acid pools in a black dragon's swamp.
